prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that camouflages with leaves and has a friendly expression.
Imagine a tiny critter Pokemon with a green body and a yellow face, perfect for forest adventures.
Generate a Pokemon that blends in with nature, featuring leaf-like wings and a cheerful demeanor.
Make a cute insect Pokemon that uses foliage for protection, with a round, friendly face.
Show me a small Pokemon that resembles a leaf, with colors that reflect its forest habitat.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, showcasing vibrant greens and earthy tones.
Give me a playful bug Pokemon with a unique leaf disguise and an adorable smile.
